name: Hamburger
description: A classic American sandwich made with a beef patty, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
recipe: Form ground beef into a patty and season with salt and pepper. Grill or fry patty until cooked through. Serve on a bun with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A refreshing and savory salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
recipe: Toss romaine lettuce with croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. Serve cold.

name: Fish and Chips
description: A British favorite consisting of battered fish and deep-fried potato slices.
recipe: Cut potatoes into slices and fry until crispy. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour and beer to create batter. Dip fish in batter and fry until golden brown. Serve hot with fries.

name: Pho
description: A Vietnamese soup made with beef broth, rice noodles, and meat.
recipe: Boil beef bones in water to create broth. Add sliced beef and rice noodles to the broth and let cook. Serve hot with bean sprouts and herbs.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A popular Indian dish consisting of marinated chicken in a tomato-based sauce.
recipe: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for several hours. Grill chicken and set aside. In a separate pan, cook tomatoes and spices to create sauce. Add chicken to the sauce and let simmer. Serve hot with rice.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: A creamy Italian pasta dish made with Parmesan cheese and butter.
recipe: Cook fettuccine pasta in salted water. In a separate pan, melt butter and stir in heavy cream. Add Parmesan cheese and cooked pasta to the pan. Serve hot.
